mms.py
Go to the documentation of this file.
1 from pylab import *
2 import sympy as sp
3 gamma = 1.4
4 mu_inf, T_inf = sp.symbols("mu_inf T_inf")
5 
6 R = 1.0
7 pr = 0.7
8 cp = gamma*R/(gamma-1.0)
9 
10 x, y = sp.symbols("x y")
11 
12 rho = 1.0 + 0.1*sp.sin(x*x + y*y)
13 u = 0.1 + 0.1*sp.cos(x*x + y*y)
14 v = 0.1 + 0.1*sp.sin(x*x + y*y)
15 p = 1/1.4 + 0.1*sp.sin(x*x)
16 
17 
18 T = p/R/rho
19 mu = mu_inf*(T/T_inf)**(2.0/3.0)
20 k = mu*cp/pr
21 
22 
23 tau_xy = mu*(sp.diff(u, y) + sp.diff(v, x))
24 tau_xx = mu*(2.0*sp.diff(u, x) - 2.0/3.0*(sp.diff(u, x) + sp.diff(v, y)))
25 tau_yy = mu*(2.0*sp.diff(v, y) - 2.0/3.0*(sp.diff(u, x) + sp.diff(v, y)))
26 
27 q_x = -k*sp.diff(T, x)
28 q_y = -k*sp.diff(T, y)
29 
30 s_1 = sp.diff(rho*u, x) + sp.diff(rho*v, y)
31 s_2 = sp.diff(rho*u*u - p, x) + sp.diff(rho*u*v, y) - sp.diff(tau_xx, x) - sp.diff(tau_xy, y)
32 s_3 = sp.diff(rho*v*v - p, y) + sp.diff(rho*u*v, x) - sp.diff(tau_yy, y) - sp.diff(tau_xy, x)
33 rhoE = p/(gamma-1.0) + 0.5*rho*(u*u+v*v)
34 s_4 = sp.diff(rhoE*u, x) + sp.diff(rhoE*v, y) - sp.diff(u*tau_xx + v*tau_xy - q_x, x) - sp.diff(u*tau_xy + v*tau_yy - q_y, y)
35 print s_1
36 print s_2
37 print s_3
38 print s_4
